title: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. Common Units (PAA) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. Common Units (NASDAQ:PAA) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 8, 2025 10:00 AM ETCompany ParticipantsAl P.
content:
Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. Common Units (NASDAQ:PAA) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 8, 2025 10:00 AM ET

Al P. Swanson - Executive VP & CFO of Plains All American GP LLC

 Blake Michael Fernandez - Vice President of Investor Relations

 Christopher R. Chandler - Executive VP & COO of Plains All American GP LLC

 Jeremy L. Goebel - Executive VP & Chief Commercial Officer of Plains All American GP LLC

 Wilfred C.W. Chiang - President, CEO & Chairman of Plains All American GP LLC

Brandon B. Bingham - Scotiabank Global Banking and Markets, Research Division

 Gabriel Philip Moreen - Mizuho Securities USA LLC, Research Division

 John Ross Mackay - Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., Research Division

 Michael Jacob Blum - Wells Fargo Securities, LLC, Research Division

 Shneur Z. Gershuni - UBS Investment Bank, Research Division

 Spiro Michael Dounis - Citigroup Inc., Research Division

 Sunil Sibal - Unidentified Company

 a division of S&P - Unidentified Company

Thank you for standing by, and welcome to PAA and PAGP's Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call. [Operator Instructions] I would now like to hand the call over to Blake Fernandez, Vice President of Investor Relations. Please go ahead.

Thank you, Latif. Good morning, and welcome to Plains All American's Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Call. Today's slide presentation is posted on the Investor Relations website under the News and Events section at ir.plains.com. An audio replay will also be available following today's call. Important disclosures regarding forward-looking statements and non-GAAP financial measures are provided on Slide 2. An overview of today's call is provided on Slide 3, consolidated -- condensed consolidating balance sheet for PAGP and other reference materials are in the appendix. Today's call will be hosted by Willie Chiang, Chairman and CEO and President; and Al Swanson, Executive Vice President and CFO, along with other members of our
summary: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. Common Units (PAA) and Plains All American GP LLC are set to hold a Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call at 10:00 AM ET. The call will be hosted by Willie Chiang, Chairman and CEO and President of Plains AllAmerican GP LLC, Al Swanson, Executive Vice President and CFO, and Christopher R. Chandler. An audio replay will be available following the call. Disclosures regarding forward-looking statements and non-GAAP financial measures are provided on Slide 2.
shortSummary: Plains All American Pipeline's Q2 2025 earnings will be discussed via phone, with executives from various companies including Willie Chiang and Al Swanson.
argos_summary: Plains All American Pipeline hosted its Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call on August 8, 2025, featuring key executives including CEO Wilfred C.W. Chiang and CFO Al P. Swanson. The call included discussions on financial performance and strategic insights, with a presentation available on their Investor Relations website. Analysts from various financial institutions participated in the call, indicating strong interest in the company's performance.
